This place is a masterclass in deception. They manually freeze their delivery clock to manipulate stats—mine sat at “9 mins” for over 7 minutes straight. It’s a pathetic tactic to gaslight customers. When the food finally arrived, it was ice-cold and inedible. Support is a joke; they slap you with a scripted “sorry” and disappear. Look at the ratings: nobody even gives them 2 stars. Save your money and avoid this scam.

Whether it’s lunch or a quick snack, the food arrives fresh and on time. Highly recommended!
